statements: DELETE FROM data_lake WHERE upload_date < '2021-01-01' AND data_size > 1000;
DELETE FROM DataLake WHERE data_id = 100 AND file_name = 'document.pdf';
DELETE FROM DataTags WHERE tag_name = 'important' AND data_id IN (SELECT data_id FROM DataLake WHERE file_type = 'image');
DELETE FROM DataTags WHERE id = 1 AND tag_id = 3;
DELETE FROM DataLake WHERE upload_time < '2022-01-01' AND file_size > 10000;
DELETE FROM data_sources WHERE source_name = 'Example Source';
DELETE FROM data_connections WHERE destination_id = 5 AND source_id = 3;
DELETE FROM data_lake_logs WHERE user_id = 10 AND action = 'delete';
